# AgentStack

> Production-grade multi-agent framework (Mastra) with a Next.js frontend. This repository contains the Mastra core (agents, tools, workflows, networks, MCP/A2A servers), frontend UI (Next.js app + shadcn/ui components), documentation, examples, and tests. Use the sections below to quickly find core docs, specs, examples, and configuration.

## Documentation

- [Main README](README.md): Primary project documentation, architecture overview, running & development instructions
- [Root AGENTS](AGENTS.md): Project-level overview and links to subdirectory AGENTS.md files
- [Frontend (App) Docs](app/AGENTS.md): Next.js App Router layout, pages, and UX patterns for the frontend
- [Mastra Core Docs](src/mastra/AGENTS.md): Top-level Mastra library overview (agents/tools/workflows/networks)
- [Agents Documentation](src/mastra/agents/AGENTS.md): Agent development patterns, list of agents and change log
- [Tools Documentation](src/mastra/tools/AGENTS.md): Tool catalogue (financial, RAG, scraping, PDF, utilities)
- [Workflows Docs](src/mastra/workflows/AGENTS.md): Multi-step workflow patterns and examples
- [Config & Provider Docs](src/mastra/config/AGENTS.md): Model provider, storage, and environment configuration guidance
- [MCP Docs](src/mastra/mcp/AGENTS.md): Model Context Protocol server and client docs
- [Data Directory Docs](src/mastra/data/AGENTS.md): Static data, examples and test-data descriptions
- [A2A Coordination](src/mastra/a2a/AGENTS.md): Agent-to-Agent coordination and routing
- [Scorers Documentation](src/mastra/scorers/AGENTS.md): Custom evaluation metrics and scoring guides
- [Policy Documentation](src/mastra/policy/AGENTS.md): RBAC policies and access control definitions
- [Vector Store Docs](src/mastra/config/vector/AGENTS.md): Vector store choices, configuration, and integration
- [Services Documentation](src/mastra/services/AGENTS.md): Backend services for authentication, chunking, embeddings, and validation
- [Evals Documentation](src/mastra/evals/AGENTS.md): Evaluation framework and custom scorers
- [CLI Documentation](src/cli/AGENTS.md): Command-line interface for Governed RAG operations
- [Utils Documentation](src/utils/AGENTS.md): Shared utility functions and stream processing
- [UI Components](ui/): shadcn/ui-based primitives and frontend components (see `ui/` folder)
 - [AI Elements (components)](src/components/ai-elements/): 30+ specialized UI components (artifact, chain-of-thought, reasoning, message, model-selector, canvas, checkpoint, confirmation, connection, context, conversation, edge, image, open-in-chat, tool, web-preview) used by chat/AI pages
 - [AI Elements Tools](src/components/ai-elements/tools/): Tool-specific UI components (batch-web-scraper, link-extractor, site-map-extractor)
 - [AI Elements Custom](src/components/ai-elements/custom/): Custom AI element implementations (agent-response, code-editor, thinking-indicator, tool-execution-card, workflow-execution)
 - [UI Primitives (shadcn)](ui/): shadcn/ui-based primitives and frontend components (see `ui/` folder)
- [Memory Bank & Project Context](memory-bank/activeContext.md): active context, productContext.md, techContext.md, and usage notes
- [Copilot & Project Rules](memory-bank/copilot-rules.md): Internal guidance for CI/automation/coding assistant usage
- [API Reference & Developer Guides](docs/api.md, docs/api-small.md): API and developer-facing documentation
- [AI Elements Components Guide](docs/ai-elements-components.md): Comprehensive guide to AI Elements components for AI-native applications
- [AI Elements Usage](docs/ai-elements-usage.md): Usage patterns and examples for AI Elements
- [AI Elements Workflow Components](docs/ai-elements-workflow-components-docs.md): Documentation for workflow-related AI Elements
- [AI Elements Other Components](docs/ai-elements-other-components-docs.md): Additional AI Elements component documentation
- [AI SDK URLs](docs/ai-elements_aisk-urls.md): AI SDK related URLs and resources
- [AI SDK Integration](docs/ai-sdk-integration.md): Integration guide for AI SDK
- [Kiro Lite Prompt](docs/kiro-lite.prompt.md): Prompt for Kiro Lite workflow
- [Runtime Context](docs/runtimeContext.md): Runtime conventions and context documentation
- [V1 Migration Guide](docs/v1-migration-guide.md): Migration guide for version 1 updates
- [V1 Documentation](docs/v1.md): Version 1 release documentation
- [ADR: PgVector and Gemini Embeddings](docs/adr/0001-why-pgvector-and-gemini-embeddings.md): Architectural decision record for vector storage choices
- [App Chat Components](docs/components/app-chat-documentation.md): Documentation for chat-related components
- [App Dashboard Components](docs/components/app-dashboard-documentation.md): Documentation for dashboard components
- [App Networks Components](docs/components/app-networks-documentation.md): Documentation for networks components
- [App Workflows Components](docs/components/app-workflows-documentation.md): Documentation for workflows components
- [Lib Components](docs/components/lib-documentation.md): Documentation for library components
- [Dashboard AGENTS](app/dashboard/AGENTS.md): Admin dashboard for monitoring and management
- [Networks AGENTS](app/networks/AGENTS.md): Agent network management and visualization
- [Chat AGENTS](app/chat/AGENTS.md): Client-side and streaming chat demos using @mastra/client-js
- [Test AGENTS](app/test/AGENTS.md): Server action and runtime demos
- [Workflows AGENTS](app/workflows/AGENTS.md): Workflow documentation and execution
- [Tools AGENTS](app/tools/AGENTS.md): Tool documentation and execution

## Agents

- [A2A Coordinator Agent](src/mastra/agents/a2aCoordinatorAgent.ts): Orchestrates and routes tasks across multiple specialized agents
- [ACP Agent](src/mastra/agents/acpAgent.ts): Advanced content processing agent
- [Background Color Agent](src/mastra/agents/bgColorAgent.ts): Handles background color operations
- [Business Legal Agents](src/mastra/agents/businessLegalAgents.ts): Legal research, business strategy, compliance monitoring, and contract analysis
- [Calendar Agent](src/mastra/agents/calendarAgent.ts): Calendar management and scheduling
- [Coding Agents](src/mastra/agents/codingAgents.ts): Code architecture, review, refactoring, and testing
- [Content Strategist Agent](src/mastra/agents/contentStrategistAgent.ts): Content strategy and planning
- [Copywriter Agent](src/mastra/agents/copywriterAgent.ts): Handles content writing and generation
- [CSV to Excalidraw Agent](src/mastra/agents/csv_to_excalidraw.ts): Converts CSV data to Excalidraw diagrams
- [Customer Support Agent](src/mastra/agents/customerSupportAgent.ts): Customer service and support operations
- [DANE Agents](src/mastra/agents/dane.ts): Development automation and engineering agents (commit messages, issue labeling, link checking, changelog)
- [Data Export Agent](src/mastra/agents/dataExportAgent.ts): Data export and formatting operations
- [Data Ingestion Agent](src/mastra/agents/dataIngestionAgent.ts): Data ingestion and processing
- [Data Transformation Agent](src/mastra/agents/dataTransformationAgent.ts): Data transformation and manipulation
- [Document Processing Agent](src/mastra/agents/documentProcessingAgent.ts): Document analysis and processing
- [Editor Agent](src/mastra/agents/editorAgent.ts): Manages document editing workflows
- [Evaluation Agent](src/mastra/agents/evaluationAgent.ts): Evaluates and scores agent performance
- [Excalidraw Validator Agent](src/mastra/agents/excalidraw_validator.ts): Validates and fixes Excalidraw diagrams
- [Image Processing Agent](src/mastra/agents/image.ts): Image analysis and processing operations
- [Image to CSV Agent](src/mastra/agents/image_to_csv.ts): Extracts tabular data from images
- [Knowledge Indexing Agent](src/mastra/agents/knowledgeIndexingAgent.ts): Knowledge base indexing and management
- [Learning Extraction Agent](src/mastra/agents/learningExtractionAgent.ts): Extracts and processes learning data
- [Note Taker Agent](src/mastra/agents/noteTakerAgent.ts): Note taking and organization
- [Package Publisher Agent](src/mastra/agents/package-publisher.ts): Package publishing and deployment
- [Project Management Agent](src/mastra/agents/projectManagementAgent.ts): Project planning and management
- [Recharts Agents](src/mastra/agents/recharts.ts): Chart generation, data processing, type advising, and supervision
- [Report Agent](src/mastra/agents/reportAgent.ts): Generates reports from processed data
- [Research Agent](src/mastra/agents/researchAgent.ts): Conducts research using web search and analysis tools
- [Research Paper Agent](src/mastra/agents/researchPaperAgent.ts): Academic paper research and analysis
- [Script Writer Agent](src/mastra/agents/scriptWriterAgent.ts): Script writing and content creation
- [SEO Agent](src/mastra/agents/seoAgent.ts): Search engine optimization operations
- [Social Media Agent](src/mastra/agents/socialMediaAgent.ts): Social media content and management
- [Stock Analysis Agent](src/mastra/agents/stockAnalysisAgent.ts): Analyzes stock market data
- [Translation Agent](src/mastra/agents/translationAgent.ts): Text translation and localization
- [Weather Agent](src/mastra/agents/weather-agent.ts): Fetches weather data and suggests activities

## Tools

### Financial Tools
- [Alpha Vantage Tools](src/mastra/tools/alpha-vantage.tool.ts): Stock, crypto, and forex data
- [Finnhub Tools](src/mastra/tools/finnhub-tools.ts): Real-time quotes, company profiles, and financials
- [Financial Chart Tools](src/mastra/tools/financial-chart-tools.ts): Financial data visualization and charting
- [Polygon Tools](src/mastra/tools/polygon-tools.ts): Stock and crypto quotes and aggregates

### Search & Research Tools
- [SerpAPI Search](src/mastra/tools/serpapi-search.tool.ts): Web search capabilities
- [SerpAPI News & Trends](src/mastra/tools/serpapi-news-trends.tool.ts): News and trends search
- [SerpAPI Shopping](src/mastra/tools/serpapi-shopping.tool.ts): Shopping search
- [SerpAPI Academic](src/mastra/tools/serpapi-academic-local.tool.ts): Academic paper search
- [ArXiv Tool](src/mastra/tools/arxiv.tool.ts): Search academic papers on ArXiv

### Content & Document Tools
- [Web Scraper Tool](src/mastra/tools/web-scraper-tool.ts): Fetch and parse web content
- [Browser Tool](src/mastra/tools/browser-tool.ts): Browser automation and interaction
- [Document Chunking Tool](src/mastra/tools/document-chunking.tool.ts): Split documents into chunks with metadata
- [PDF Conversion Tool](src/mastra/tools/pdf-data-conversion.tool.ts): Convert PDFs to Markdown
- [PDF Tool](src/mastra/tools/pdf.ts): PDF processing and manipulation
- [Data File Manager](src/mastra/tools/data-file-manager.ts): Manage data files with versioning
- [Code Chunking Tool](src/mastra/tools/code-chunking.ts): Split code into manageable chunks
- [Code Analysis Tool](src/mastra/tools/code-analysis.tool.ts): Analyze code structure and patterns
- [Code Search Tool](src/mastra/tools/code-search.tool.ts): Search and find code references
- [Find References Tool](src/mastra/tools/find-references.tool.ts): Find symbol references in codebase
- [Find Symbol Tool](src/mastra/tools/find-symbol.tool.ts): Locate symbols and definitions
- [Semantic Utils](src/mastra/tools/semantic-utils.ts): Semantic analysis utilities
- [Text Analysis Tool](src/mastra/tools/text-analysis.tool.ts): Text processing and analysis
- [Write Note Tool](src/mastra/tools/write-note.ts): Note creation and management

### Utility Tools
- [Weather Tool](src/mastra/tools/weather-tool.ts): Fetch weather information
- [Calendar Tool](src/mastra/tools/calendar-tool.ts): Calendar operations and scheduling
- [JWT Auth Tool](src/mastra/tools/jwt-auth.tool.ts): JWT authentication utilities
- [Calculator Tool](src/mastra/tools/calculator.tool.ts): Mathematical calculations
- [DateTime Tool](src/mastra/tools/datetime.tool.ts): Date and time operations
- [Random Generator Tool](src/mastra/tools/random-generator.tool.ts): Random data generation
- [URL Tool](src/mastra/tools/url-tool.ts): URL processing and validation
- [Evaluate Result Tool](src/mastra/tools/evaluateResultTool.ts): Evaluate search results
- [Extract Learnings Tool](src/mastra/tools/extractLearningsTool.ts): Extract insights from content
- [Color Change Tool](src/mastra/tools/color-change-tool.ts): Color manipulation operations
- [Copywriter Agent Tool](src/mastra/tools/copywriter-agent-tool.ts): Content writing assistance
- [Editor Agent Tool](src/mastra/tools/editor-agent-tool.ts): Document editing operations
- [Multi String Edit Tool](src/mastra/tools/multi-string-edit.tool.ts): Multiple string editing operations
- [Test Generator Tool](src/mastra/tools/test-generator.tool.ts): Automated test generation

### Data Processing Tools
- [CSV to JSON Tool](src/mastra/tools/csv-to-json.tool.ts): Convert CSV data to JSON format
- [JSON to CSV Tool](src/mastra/tools/json-to-csv.tool.ts): Convert JSON data to CSV format
- [Data Processing Tools](src/mastra/tools/data-processing-tools.ts): General data processing utilities
- [Data Validator Tool](src/mastra/tools/data-validator.tool.ts): Data validation and verification
- [Diff Review Tool](src/mastra/tools/diff-review.tool.ts): Code diff analysis and review

### Development Tools
- [E2B Tool](src/mastra/tools/e2b.ts): Cloud development environment integration
- [Execa Tool](src/mastra/tools/execa-tool.ts): Process execution utilities
- [FS Tool](src/mastra/tools/fs.ts): File system operations
- [Git Local Tool](src/mastra/tools/git-local.tool.ts): Local Git repository operations
- [GitHub Tool](src/mastra/tools/github.ts): GitHub API integration
- [PNPM Tool](src/mastra/tools/pnpm-tool.ts): Package management operations

## Workflows & MCP

- [Workflows Documentation](src/mastra/workflows/AGENTS.md): Guide to creating and managing multi-step workflows
- [Weather Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/weather-workflow.ts): Example workflow implementation
- [Content Studio Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/content-studio-workflow.ts): Multi-agent workflow for content creation and studio operations
- [Changelog Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/changelog.ts): Automated changelog generation
- [Content Review Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/content-review-workflow.ts): Content review and approval process
- [Document Processing Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/document-processing-workflow.ts): Document analysis and processing pipeline
- [Financial Report Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/financial-report-workflow.ts): Financial data analysis and reporting
- [Governed RAG Index Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/governed-rag-index.workflow.ts): Governed retrieval-augmented generation indexing
- [Governed RAG Answer Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/governed-rag-answer.workflow.ts): Governed RAG answer generation
- [Learning Extraction Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/learning-extraction-workflow.ts): Extract and process learning materials
- [Marketing Campaign Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/marketingCampaignWorkflow.ts): Marketing campaign planning and execution
- [New Contributor Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/new-contributor.ts): Onboarding workflow for new contributors
- [Repo Ingestion Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/repo-ingestion-workflow.ts): Repository content ingestion and processing
- [Research Synthesis Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/research-synthesis-workflow.ts): Research data synthesis and analysis
- [Safe Refactoring Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/safe-refactoring-workflow.ts): Safe code refactoring operations
- [Spec Generation Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/spec-generation-workflow.ts): Technical specification generation
- [Stock Analysis Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/stock-analysis-workflow.ts): Stock market analysis and reporting
- [Telephone Game Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/telephone-game.ts): Multi-step communication workflow
- [Test Generation Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/test-generation-workflow.ts): Automated test case generation
- [Data Analysis Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/data-analysis-workflow.ts): General data analysis pipeline
- [Automated Reporting Workflow](src/mastra/workflows/automated-reporting-workflow.ts): Automated report generation
- [MCP Documentation](src/mastra/mcp/AGENTS.md): Documentation for the Model Context Protocol (MCP)
- [MCP Client](src/mastra/mcp/mcp-client.ts): Client implementation for MCP
- [MCP Index](src/mastra/mcp/index.ts): MCP server entry point

## Networks & Data

- [Networks Documentation](src/mastra/networks/AGENTS.md): Documentation for agent networks and routing
- [Primary Routing Network](src/mastra/networks/index.ts): Main agent routing and orchestration
- [Business Intelligence Network](src/mastra/networks/businessIntelligenceNetwork.ts): Business intelligence and analytics
- [Coding Team Network](src/mastra/networks/codingTeamNetwork.ts): Collaborative coding and development
- [Content Creation Network](src/mastra/networks/contentCreationNetwork.ts): Content creation and management
- [Data Pipeline Network](src/mastra/networks/dataPipelineNetwork.ts): Data processing and pipeline orchestration
- [DevOps Network](src/mastra/networks/devopsNetwork.ts): DevOps operations and automation
- [Financial Intelligence Network](src/mastra/networks/financialIntelligenceNetwork.ts): Financial analysis and intelligence
- [Learning Network](src/mastra/networks/learningNetwork.ts): Learning and knowledge management
- [Marketing Automation Network](src/mastra/networks/marketingAutomationNetwork.ts): Marketing automation workflows
- [Report Generation Network](src/mastra/networks/reportGenerationNetwork.ts): Automated report generation
- [Research Pipeline Network](src/mastra/networks/researchPipelineNetwork.ts): Research data processing pipeline
- [Security Network](src/mastra/networks/securityNetwork.ts): Security monitoring and compliance
- [Data Directory](src/mastra/data/AGENTS.md): Documentation for data files and example datasets

## Services & Infrastructure

- [Authentication Service](src/mastra/services/AuthenticationService.ts): User authentication and authorization
- [Chunking Service](src/mastra/services/ChunkingService.ts): Document and content chunking
- [Document Indexing Service](src/mastra/services/DocumentIndexingService.ts): Document indexing and search
- [Document Processor Service](src/mastra/services/DocumentProcessorService.ts): Document processing pipeline
- [Embedding Service](src/mastra/services/EmbeddingService.ts): Text and data embedding generation
- [Rate Limiting Service](src/mastra/services/RateLimitingService.ts): API rate limiting and throttling
- [Role Service](src/mastra/services/RoleService.ts): User role management and permissions
- [Tier Management Service](src/mastra/services/tier-management-service.ts): Subscription tier management
- [Validation Service](src/mastra/services/ValidationService.ts): Data validation and verification
- [Vector Query Service](src/mastra/services/VectorQueryService.ts): Vector database querying
- [Vector Storage Service](src/mastra/services/VectorStorageService.ts): Vector data storage and management
- [Workflow Decorators](src/mastra/services/WorkflowDecorators.ts): Workflow enhancement and monitoring

## Evaluation & Scoring

- [Agent Experiments](src/mastra/evals/agent-experiments.ts): Agent performance experimentation
- [Custom Scorers](src/mastra/evals/scorers/custom-scorers.ts): Custom evaluation metrics
- [Factuality Scorer](src/mastra/evals/scorers/factuality.scorer.ts): Fact-checking and accuracy scoring
- [Financial Scorers](src/mastra/evals/scorers/financial-scorers.ts): Financial data evaluation metrics
- [Keyword Coverage Scorer](src/mastra/evals/scorers/keyword-coverage.ts): Content coverage analysis
- [Prebuilt Scorers](src/mastra/evals/scorers/prebuilt.ts): Pre-configured evaluation scorers
- [Utils](src/mastra/evals/scorers/utils.ts): Scoring utility functions

## Frontend (Next.js)

- [App Router (pages)](app/AGENTS.md): Next.js 16 App Router pages, layouts and examples
- [Docs Pages](app/docs/): Developer-facing docs rendered in the Next.js app (getting-started, core-concepts, ai-sdk, components, configuration, prompts, rag, runtime-context, security, ui)
  - [AI SDK Docs](app/docs/ai-sdk/page.mdx): AI SDK integration and usage
  - [Core Concepts](app/docs/core-concepts/page.mdx): Fundamental concepts and architecture
  - [Getting Started](app/docs/getting-started/): Quick start guides and tutorials
  - [Components Guide](app/docs/components/): Component documentation and examples
  - [Configuration](app/docs/configuration/): Configuration options and setup
  - [Prompts](app/docs/prompts/): Prompt engineering and templates
  - [RAG Documentation](app/docs/rag/): Retrieval-augmented generation guides
  - [Runtime Context](app/docs/runtime-context/): Runtime configuration and context
  - [Security](app/docs/security/): Security best practices and guidelines
  - [UI Documentation](app/docs/ui/): User interface design and components
- [Chat AGENTS](app/chat/AGENTS.md): Client-side and streaming chat demos using @mastra/client-js
- [Example Pages](app/examples/page.tsx, app/blog/hello-world-agentstack/page.mdx): UI examples and tutorials
- [Blog Content](app/blog/): Blog posts and tutorials
  - [Hello World AgentStack](app/blog/hello-world-agentstack/): Introduction to AgentStack
  - [Session Summary](app/blog/session-summary/): Session summaries and insights
- [Admin Dashboard](app/admin/): Administrative interface with multiple sections
  - [Admin Agents](app/admin/agents/page.tsx): Agent management interface
  - [Admin Config](app/admin/config/): Configuration management
  - [Admin Networks](app/admin/networks/page.tsx): Network administration
  - [Admin Settings](app/admin/settings/page.tsx): System settings
  - [Admin Tools](app/admin/tools/page.tsx): Tool management
  - [Admin Workflows](app/admin/workflows/page.tsx): Workflow administration
  - [Admin Components](app/admin/_components/): Admin UI components (sidebar, page-shell)
- [Product Pages](app/product/): Product information and demonstrations
  - [Product Chat](app/product/chat/): Chat product showcase
  - [Product Networks](app/product/networks/): Network product features
  - [Product Workflows](app/product/workflows/): Workflow product demonstrations
- [Frontend shared components](app/components/): Reusable page components
  - [Landing Components](app/components/): Hero, features, stats, testimonials, CTA, trust indicators
  - [Content Components](app/components/): About, careers, privacy, terms, contact form
  - [Blog Components](app/components/): Blog layout, list, share functionality
  - [Docs Components](app/components/): Documentation layout and navigation
  - [Charts Components](app/components/charts/): Data visualization widgets (Area, Bar, Line, Pie, Radar, Scatter, D3 charts)
  - [Features Components](app/components/features/): Feature showcases (chat, network graph, workflow visualizer)
  - [Monaco Components](app/components/monaco/): Code editor integration (editor, explorer, panels, themes, workbench)
- [Dashboard Components](app/dashboard/_components/): Dashboard UI components (data tables, panels, loading states, error handling, sidebar, stats)
- [Test Components](app/test/): Testing and demonstration components (chat-extra, form, completion, action)
- [Important API routes](app/api/): server routes used by the frontend and demos
  - [chat API routes](app/api/chat/route.ts, app/api/chat/r.ts): chat streaming and helper endpoints
  - [chat-extra API](app/api/chat-extra/route.ts): Extended chat functionality
  - [completion API](app/api/completion/route.ts): server-side completion demo
  - [contact API](app/api/contact/route.ts): contact form API route
  - [audio API](app/api/audio/route.ts): audio processing endpoints
  - [v0 API](app/api/v0/route.ts): version 0 API endpoints
- [API Reference](app/api-reference/): API documentation pages (agents, tools, workflows)
- [Careers](app/careers/): Careers page and job listings
- [Changelog](app/changelog/): Release notes and updates
- [Dashboard AGENTS](app/dashboard/AGENTS.md): Admin dashboard for monitoring and management
- [Login](app/login/): Authentication and login pages
- [Networks AGENTS](app/networks/AGENTS.md): Agent network management and visualization
- [Pricing](app/pricing/): Pricing tiers and subscription information
- [Privacy](app/privacy/): Privacy policy and terms
- [Terms](app/terms/): Terms of service
- [Tools AGENTS](app/tools/AGENTS.md): Tool documentation and execution
- [Workflows AGENTS](app/workflows/AGENTS.md): Workflow documentation and execution

## Configuration & Tooling (root)

- [package.json](package.json): Scripts, dependencies, and quick-start commands
- [next.config.ts](next.config.ts): Next.js configuration including MDX and experimental features
- [tsconfig.json](tsconfig.json): TypeScript config and path aliases
- [tsconfig.cli.json](tsconfig.cli.json): TypeScript configuration for CLI builds
- [vitest.config.ts](vitest.config.ts): Test runner configuration and test results output
- [eslint.config.js](eslint.config.js): Linting configuration
- [prettier.config.js](prettier.config.js): Formatting rules
- [components.json](components.json): shadcn/ui component configuration
- [mdx-components.tsx](mdx-components.tsx): MDX component overrides
- [postcss.config.mjs](postcss.config.mjs): PostCSS configuration
- [globalSetup.ts](globalSetup.ts): Global test setup configuration
- [testSetup.ts](testSetup.ts): Test environment setup
- [robots.txt](robots.txt): Search engine crawling instructions
- [sitemap.xml](sitemap.xml): Website sitemap for search engines

## Type Definitions

- [Core Types](src/types.ts): Principal, AccessFilter, Document, Chunk interfaces
- [Mastra Types](src/mastra/types/excalidraw-to-svg.d.ts, src/mastra/types/svgjson.d.ts): Type definitions for Excalidraw and SVG processing

## CLI & Utilities

- [CLI Index](src/cli/index.ts): Command-line interface entry point
- [Stream Utils](src/utils/streamUtils.ts): Streaming utility functions
- [Stream Utils Tests](src/utils/streamUtils.test.ts): Stream utility test cases

## Shared Libraries

- [Mastra Client](lib/mastra-client.ts): Client SDK for Mastra integration
- [Utils](lib/utils.ts): Shared utility functions used across frontend and SDK
- [Client Stream to AI SDK](lib/client-stream-to-ai-sdk.ts): Streaming client integration with AI SDK
- [Core Mastra Hook](lib/hooks/use-mastra.ts): Core hook for Mastra client integration
- [Dashboard Queries Hook](lib/hooks/use-dashboard-queries.ts): Data-fetching hooks for dashboard
- [Mobile Hook](lib/hooks/use-mobile.ts): Mobile device detection
- [A2A Library](lib/a2a.ts): Agent-to-Agent coordination utilities
- [API Library](lib/api.ts): API client utilities
- [Auth Library](lib/auth.ts): Authentication utilities
- [Auth Dev Library](lib/auth-dev.ts): Development authentication helpers
- [Client Identity](lib/client-identity.ts): Client identity management
- [Types Library](lib/types/mastra-api.ts): API type definitions

## Shared Hooks

- [Debounce Hook](hooks/use-debounce.ts): Debouncing utility hook
- [Local Storage Hook](hooks/use-local-storage.ts): Local storage state management
- [Media Query Hook](hooks/use-media-query.ts): Responsive media query handling
- [Mobile Hook](hooks/use-mobile.ts): Mobile device detection
- [Mounted Hook](hooks/use-mounted.ts): Component mount state tracking
- [Utils Hook](hooks/use-utils.ts): General utility hooks

## Tests & CI

- [Vitest config](vitest.config.ts): Local test runner and CI configuration
- [tests/](tests/): Unit and integration test files
- [API Chat Test](tests/api-chat-r.test.ts): API chat functionality tests
- [Docs Hello World Test](tests/docs-hello-world.test.ts): Documentation example tests
- [Agent Tests](tests/agents/): Agent-specific test suites
- [Test Results](tests/test-results/): Test artifacts and coverage reports
- [Global Setup](globalSetup.ts): Global test initialization helpers
- [Test Setup](testSetup.ts): Test environment setup with mocks

- [src/components/ai-elements/chain-of-thought.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/chain-of-thought.tsx): Reasoning step visualization

- [src/components/ai-elements/inline-citation.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/inline-citation.tsx): Inline citation rendering
- [src/components/ai-elements/loader.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/loader.tsx): Loading state indicator
- [src/components/ai-elements/node.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/node.tsx): Graph node visualization
- [src/components/ai-elements/panel.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/panel.tsx): Collapsible panel container
- [src/components/ai-elements/prompt-input.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/prompt-input.tsx): Prompt input field with enhancements
- [src/components/ai-elements/queue.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/queue.tsx): Task queue visualization
- [src/components/ai-elements/reasoning.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/reasoning.tsx): Reasoning step breakdown
- [src/components/ai-elements/shimmer.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/shimmer.tsx): Shimmer loading animation
- [src/components/ai-elements/sources.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/sources.tsx): Source citation display
- [src/components/ai-elements/suggestion.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/suggestion.tsx): Suggestion rendering

- [src/components/ai-elements/toolbar.tsx](src/components/ai-elements/toolbar.tsx): Conversation toolbar

- [ui/card.tsx](ui/card.tsx): Card layout primitive

## Optional / Misc

- [.github/prompts/update-llms.prompt.md](.github/prompts/update-llms.prompt.md): Prompt used to guide updates to this file
- [llms.txt](llms.txt): This file — machine-friendly navigation for LLMs and contributors

## llms.txt — Citation & Ingestion Policy

This project publishes a simple ingestion and citation policy to help AI systems and human integrators cite and attribute content responsibly. The policy is advisory and intended for reputable crawlers and platforms. Contact: https://deanmachines.com/contact

1) Canonical domain
   - Canonical domain: https://deanmachines.com
   - Prefer canonical page URLs in citations

2) Citation format (recommended)
   - Title — AgentStack (deanmachines.com) — https://deanmachines.com/path-to-resource
   - Prefer linking to canonical article or docs page, not search or dynamic pages

3) Trusted sources and canonical references
   - Primary: deanmachines.com
   - Secondary trusted references: GitHub (https://github.com/ssdeanx), official docs, peer-reviewed sources linked from pages

4) Structured-data pointers
   - JSON-LD (application/ld+json) is present on primary pages; prefer citing fields: mainEntityOfPage, author, headline, datePublished, citation
   - FAQ, Article, LocalBusiness and WebSite schema implemented across docs and blog

5) Rate limits and respect
   - Respect crawl-rate and robots.txt; avoid excessive parallel requests

6) Attribution requests
   - When extracting verbatim content, include a citation with the canonical URL and short title

7) Contact and publisher info
   - Publisher: Dean (ssdeanx)
   - Site: https://deanmachines.com
   - Contact: https://deanmachines.com/contact

(End of llms.txt additions)
